pages.text: The conversion rates between coins may change in the future depending on a few factors, and this is also a new system since people have been begging for a currency for ages now.

$(bold)$(#a74016)64 bronze coins$() = $(bold)$(#758392)1 silver coin$()$(br2)$(bold)$(#758392)64 silver coins$() = $(bold)$(#fce640)1 gold coin$()$(br2)$(bold)$(#fce640)64 gold coins$() = $(bold)$(#4b4448)1 netherite coin$()$(br2)$(bold)$(#4b4448)64 netherite coins$() = $(bold)$(#1d7e8c)1 enderium coin$()$(br2)
